<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_852107_enterpr_0.Attach1</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Attach1</name><script><![CDATA[var Attach1 = Class.create();
Attach1.prototype = {
attachment: function(attach_other_document, number) {
                var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
                gr.addQuery("sys_id", attach_other_document);
                gr.query();
                if (gr.next()) {
                    gr.table_name = 'x_852107_enterpr_0_governance_item';
                    gr.table_sys_id = number;
                    gr.update();
                }


            },

    type: 'Attach1'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-05 05:04:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>39758d42973c6110a6e5bf36f053af40</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attach1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture" source="x_852107_enterpr_0">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39758d42973c6110a6e5bf36f053af40</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-05 05:16:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
